ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I think he did have an RL relationship with her. But I m not sure. I am still pissed at him about it. I lost all the xp I d earned that day bc of his
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I think he did have an RL relationship with her. But I'm not sure.
I am still pissed at him about it. I lost all the xp I'd earned that day bc
of his stupid actions. I was pissed that he would be so mean to my friend
but it's unforgivable for him to drag someone else into it that he didn't
even know and that had never been mean to him.
luv,
-Su

> Ok I'm guessing that this guy wasn't in your guild as well. Otherwise
with
> behavior like that he would have to be guild history. I just don't get
> it...it's not like it's a RL relationship. Oh well. I would have been
soooo
> mad at that guy for the train.
>
> Lena
>
>
> > Well, this should give you someting to gossip about. In my guild I have
a
> > friend,we'll just call her Luv. Luvs ex-boyfriend, Shift (that is his
actual
> > character name on The Tribunal), was jealous that a married player gave
Luv
> > an item.
> > They ended up breaking up. Luv started seeing someone else. Shift
started
> > harassing her. He followed her around. Went to the zones she went to.
She
> > asked him to leave her alone. he would still harass her. So, we're on a
> > guild raid and he shows up. He buffs me and is really polite. I thank
him
> > and am polite to him. Then Luv explains that he is her ex. He comes up
and
> > starts insulting her equipment. Saying stuff like "That's a pathetic
staff"
> > and stuff like that. She politely responds "Well, it's the best I can
get at
> > my level". He makes some other snide remark. She tells me in group that
he's
> > annoying her. He makes her feel threatened. He goes away for awhile bc
we
> > start fighting stuff. (and we have another male character in group with
us).
> > He comes back awhile later and starts talking to her. She tells me she
> > really doesn't want to talk to him. I tell him that she doesn't want to
talk
> > to him. (as politely as I can). He hangs around for awhile just saying
> > nothing (as far as I know-- I think he might've been sending her tells).
I
> > told her to put him on /ignore. she said that she tried it and it didn't
> > work. He kept bugging her. I said maybe we should petition to make him
go
> > away.
> > Anyways, our male group member left and it was just me and Luv. So this
jerk
> > comes back. I state that the ledge is camped. He says "I see that". I
said
> > "So you're here because..?" He said he was going to pull a train to us.
then
> > he shouts "Where is my train?" I tell him "no no no. We already have as
much
> > as we can handle here. don't pull any trains to us,thank you."
> > So he goes away. We fight some elites and run out of mana killing them.
> > Right after we were oom, he pulls a train of like 5 elites onto us
saying
> > "here, take it" and then leaves us to die. Luv trites to run away. he
sends
> > her a tell and laughs at her for running. I try to pull some off to buy
her
> > some time. they come and aggro on me. I try to get to safety. we both
call
> > for help. We both die. I see Shift outside and say "You got me killed!"
he
> > turns and runs from me. I say "Hey!" and he just runs off and camps.
> > couldn't even have the decency to apologize to me. And he did it all to
get
> > at his ex-gf. Jerk. I petitioned as soon as I had come back from being
dead.
> > but he still logged before any GM answered Luv's petition. The GM never
> > answered mine. It really sucked.
> > luv,
> > -Su
>
>
>
>
>
